Last part of my treatment was done at the hospital last night and I returned home. Thank goodness I am very well. http://t.co/lkokq3pf
In order to ensure that the treatment process is carried out in the best possible way, all the necessary precautions are to be taken, especially ...
... I thank all the staff of Hacettepe Hospital.
As my old doctors, Professor who organized the treatment. Ergin Turan and Prof. Erol Belgin Beyler especially,
who are involved in the treatment process by participating in the consultation of the relevant department heads and all the staff of the hospital, as well as other hospitals ...
... I would like to express my sincere appreciation to all the health professionals and the Presidential health team.
My citizens who are in love with my love and prayers once again wish health and enjoyment from Allah and I thank everyone.

Do not get jealous, Messrs. Roberto!
